::Dark Prime/Magmatron::

    Dark Prime was returning to his home, but on =
his way he had noticed signals of another evil bot. He deiced to check it o=
ut.
    Nearing the Sulaco he tried to walk in. But the autoguns shot him a=
s he turned and ran. Then he used the Oracle, once again, to mask his Spark=
. He walked in, but the Autoguns did follow him.
    Magmatron became aware=
 that someone had tried to enter, but had failed. He turned on the camera s=
ystem and saw a bot walking in.
    "Computer," He bellowed. "How is this p=
ossible?!"
    "I can detect no Spark on this Transformer," The computer re=
plied. "Scans indicate that it is Autobot in origon, but Decpticon in signa=
l."
    "Interesting," Magmatron said, a little calmer. "Allow the bot to f=
ind the conference room, and only the conference room."
    The hallways sh=
ut down leading from the main doors to the conference room. Dark Prime walk=
ed in and saw Mantella. Then Magmatron walked in.
    "Welcome," He said in=
 a friendly tone. "Please, make yourself at home."
    Dark Prime simply st=
ood there. "I like your base, I think I'll take it."
    The Autoguns dropp=
ed from the cealing because Dark Prime let his Spark be seen again. They ai=
med, but a wave of Magmatron's hand stopped them.
    "I'm afraid you will =
find that impossible," He said. "I am this base. But I do have a propositio=
n for you."
    Dark Prime raised his mechanical eyebrow. "Tell me."
    "Y=
ou work for us," Magmatron said.
    "That's it?" Prime looked at him again=
. "I should kill you now for insulting my intellegence."
    Prime walked u=
p to Magmatron, they were about the same height. Prime got in Magmatron's f=
ace and glared.
    "You have no idea of what Power I hold," He said.
    "=
The Key to Vector Sigma," Magmatron relpied, The Autobot Matrix of Leadersh=
ip, the Oracle, shall I go on?"
    Prime was amazed that the bot knew this=
. But he didn't show it. 
    "But I have something that I could offer you,=
" Magmatron said and on a computer screen suspended from the cealing it sho=
wed one peice of Cybertronian techology that many would kill, and have, to =
get. "The Key to the Ark."
    Prime looked amazed. "Where did you get that=
?"
    "A bot from a long time ago," Magmatron said. "Now, do we have a dea=
l?"
    The shook hands, the deal was sealed, Dark Prime was going to help =
the Destrons.
    "Cerberus," Magmatron said into his comm. "We have a new =
Allie. Please return to base."
